ok, I have a user id of "dph_of_rules".  Last night, I eliminated one 
bug and set things up to eliminate the bigger bug.  Note: you'll 
probably have to guide me through the steps to upload a new file.  But 
that will be after Saturday.

 
> In related news, I got the pix editor fully functional today. I 
would have done it several days ago, but I've been extremely busy. Its 
not userfriendly, but it can zoom, skip through frames, and edit? This 
pixie editor can be used to edit any .pix file. So any artists out 
there, you can have at it :-). Download the latest from CVS, compile, 
and you're ready to go.

cool.
